verses.verse: <S%G5127><s%> For This Cause <S%G5484><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Paul 3972 N-NSM 3588 T-NSM Prisoner 1198 N-NSM Of The 3588 T-GSM Christ 5547 N-GSM Jesus 2424 N-GSM For 5228 PREP You 5216 P-2GP 3588 T-GPN Nations, 1484 N-GPN

If Indeed <S%G1489><s%> Ye Heard Of <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Administration <S%G3622><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> By <S%G2596><s%> Revelation <S%G602><s%> He Made Known <S%G1107><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mystery, <S%G3466><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> I Wrote Before <S%G4270><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Briefly, <S%G3641><s%>

By <S%G4314><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Are Able, <S%G1410><s%> Reading It, <S%G314><s%> To Perceive <S%G3539><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4907><s%> My Understanding <S%G3450><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mystery <S%G3466><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Generations <S%G1074><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Made Known <S%G1107><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> It Was Revealed <S%G601><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%>

To Be <S%G1511><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Joint Heirs <S%G4789><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Joint Body <S%G4954><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Joint Partakers <S%G4830><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1860><s%> Of His Promise <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings; <S%G2098><s%>

Of Which <S%G3739><s%> I Became <S%G1096><s%> Servant <S%G1249><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G1431><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Given <S%G1325><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Working <S%G1753><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1411><s%> Of His Power. <S%G846><s%>

To Me, <S%G1698><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Less Than The Least <S%G1647><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5485><s%> This Grace, <S%G3778><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> To Announce The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unsearchable <S%G421><s%> Riches <S%G4149><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To Enlighten <S%G5461><s%> All As To <S%G3956><s%> What Is <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fellowship <S%G2842><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Mystery <S%G3466><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Hidden <S%G613><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Created <S%G2936><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Might Be Known <S%G1107><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Principalities <S%G746><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Authorities <S%G1849><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenlies <S%G2032><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multifarious <S%G4182><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%>

According To The <S%G2596><s%> Purpose <S%G4286><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages, <S%G165><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Made <S%G4160><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord, <S%G2257><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Boldness <S%G3954><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Access <S%G4318><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Confidence <S%G4006><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Of Him. <S%G846><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I Beseech You <S%G154><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Faint <S%G1573><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tribulations <S%G2347><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G1391><s%> Your Glory. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G5127><s%> For This Cause <S%G5484><s%> I Bow <S%G2578><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1119><s%> My Knees <S%G3450><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, Christ, <S%G5547><s%>
Of <S%G1537><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Family <S%G3965><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Is Named, <S%G3687><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G1325><s%> <S%G1325><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Riches <S%G4149><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> Of His Glory, <S%G846><s%> With Power <S%G1411><s%> To Be Strengthened <S%G2901><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> His Spirit <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inner <S%G2080><s%> Man; <S%G444><s%>

For To Dwell <S%G2730><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts, <S%G5216><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Being Rooted <S%G4492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Founded, <S%G2311><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Be Fully Able <S%G1840><s%> To Apprehend <S%G2638><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> What Is <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Breadth <S%G4114><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Length <S%G3372><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Depth <S%G899><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Height; <S%G5311><s%>

<S%G1097><s%> And To Know <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Surpassing <S%G5235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Be Filled <S%G4137><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fulness <S%G4138><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But To Him Who <S%G1161><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> Above <S%G5228><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5228><s%> <S%G4057><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> We Ask <S%G154><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Think, <S%G3539><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G1754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%>

To Him Be <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Generations <S%G1074><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Age <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
